content:
# I have moved back to the stone resource position.
# Now that I am within range, I can attempt to place the stone furnace again.

# Let's place the stone furnace at this position.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=stone_position)  # Place the stone furnace at the stone resource position.
print(f"Furnace placed at {furnace.position}.")  # Indicate the position of the placed furnace.
